resources:
ColorMe Settings Color Brush About Developed by Thomas Bau and Alex Hornick. This is a painting app where you can draw with lines, rectangles, and freestyle! You can select different colors, line thickness, and even a color filter. You can also erase any mistakes using the eraser.
Logo Made with Logo Maker by Alex Hornick
 Circle graphic by Madebyoliver from Flaticon is licensed under CC BY 3.0. Made with Logo Maker
 Remove graphic by Pixel perfect from Flaticon is licensed under CC BY 3.0. Made with Logo Maker
 File graphic by Roundicons from Flaticon is licensed under CC BY 3.0. Made with Logo Maker
